mapper.select: SELECT i.id AS id, i.product_id AS productId, p.name AS productName, i.title AS title, i.content AS content, i.answer AS answer, i.answered_at AS answeredAt, i.created_at AS createdAt FROM inquiries i JOIN products p ON i.product_id = p.id WHERE i.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY i.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiries (product_id, user_id, title, content) VALUES (#{productId}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{content})
